data.message: If it is true Em that you did start this issue E= an MC enflamed enraged estranged God square entangled a goat Times Squared in his range regardless the rank, better thank your bank that death threats covered till the end, but your worst enemy is you, remember the prophecy my friend, trump is an emotional trumpet n I don't follow your shit n watch you nearly enough🐲evolution coming quick but we cannot all afford a bunker, you should be a deep n critical thinker, you really wanting to push the button on all our soul, maybe need some time in the hole, your own mind will leave you there, rhymes till I'm in the lime light alike burning eternally super star you are infinite yes, but soon brother soon off the moon to see another born to blessedness n I'm yet to be evident with it! I understand the Adam Sandler alike realness funny person, I'm not cursing, cruising as an upcoming for a bruising or nothing G. That which you do, do quickly, we're all waiting, hating but your beautiful be free homie, another soldier roaming sincerely. Conceicao(Pronounced: CAN-SEE-SOO).
